About Me

I am a Data Scientist at Allstate, a research affiliate at the Fiscal Research Center at Georgia State University, and a graduate student in Mathematics at Miami University in Oxford, Ohio. Click here to view my CV.

You may contact me at brettcmullins(at)gmail.

This radio program on Frank Ramsey has influenced my thinking and interests greatly.

Research Interests

Topological learning theory, Causal Modeling, Formal Epistemology, Explainable/Interpretable AI, Algorithmic Fairness, Public Finance and Income Mobility

My research involves using tools from mathematics, logic, and machine learning to approach a problem from a unique perspective.

See more about specific projects on my projects page.
